name: how-familiar-are-you-with-bitcoin
question: How familiar are you with Bitcoin?

options.answer: I'm already familiar with bitcoin, but I'm looking to learn more.

name: do-you-own-bitcoin
question: Do you already own any bitcoin?

name: how-do-you-see-yourself-using-bitcoin
question: How do you see yourself using bitcoin?

options.answer: I would like to start saving with bitcoin.
I would like to pay people with bitcoin.

name: which-of-these-concerns-you-the-most
question: Which of these concerns you the most?

options.answer: Security - I want to keep my bitcoin secure
Censorship - I do not want to be told who I can pay
Confiscation - I do not want my funds to be seized by a trusted third party
